title: Pichu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Charm: Redirect a player to a target of your choice. They'll be aware they were redirected but not who they were redirected to. You can use this on your allies. (âˆž uses)
- Play Nice: Set a player's Attack value to none until the end of the next night. (2 uses)
- Nasty Plot: Increase a fellow Pokemember's next attack increase in value by a tier and use Astral. (2 uses)
- Evolve: Evolve into **Pikachu**. May only be used once Charm has been used to kill someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Agility: You're capable of using two abilities in the same night as long as you have enough uses.

desc:
Post 2300
*Don't let it's charm fool you, for it's quite a mischievous Pokemon.*
